overview: Business executive with over 17 years of corporate experience in sales and operations. Proven track record and known managerial, organizational, analytical, and interpersonal skills. Background includes CEO and Founder of Contour Data Solutions, Vice President of Sales at Clearpath Solutions Group and North American Sales manager for GMAC Commercial Mortgage Technology Europe, LTD, Regional channel Manager from Quest Software, where he managed channel partners for the Northwest region. Prior to that, he worked at EMC for several years as a Territory Sales Representative in their Commercial Division earning many awards for my achievements in sales. He also jumpstart a company called CampusCareerCenter.com as their Director of Client Services for both a sales and client services team. Began my career with the US Postal Service spending close to 7 years managing Customer Services and Delivery Operations in the Boston District. Hold a degrees from Northeastern University.
